xsd:annotation.xsd:documentation: Correlate first occurrence of trigger item.
Correlate last occurrence of trigger item.
Keep updating the item by resetting the window.
Correlate first occurrence of trigger item.
Correlate last occurrence of trigger item.

DisplayString.Name: Privileged Monitoring Account
DisplayString.Description: This profile is used for monitoring which can only be done with a high level of privilege to a system -- For example, monitoring requiring LocalSystem or Local Administrator privileges. This profile defaults to LocalSystem unless specifically overridden for a target system.

DisplayString.Name: System Library
DisplayString.Description: System Library: Root for all Management Packs. Contains platform independent definitions.

DisplayString.Name: Object
DisplayString.Description: Defines the basic properties of objects

DisplayString.Name: Logical Entity
DisplayString.Description: Defines the basic properties of logical entities

DisplayString.Name: Physical Entity
DisplayString.Description: Defines the basic properties of physical entities

DisplayString.Name: Database
DisplayString.Description: Defines the basic properties of databases

DisplayString.Name: Logical Hardware Component
DisplayString.Description: Defines the basic properties of the logical hardware components that a computer contains, such as network cards

DisplayString.Name: Device
DisplayString.Description: Defines the basic properties of standalone devices, such as a computer

DisplayString.Name: Computer
DisplayString.Description: Defines the basic properties of all computers, such as a Windows computer

DisplayString.Name: Mobile device
DisplayString.Description: Defines the basic properties of all mobile devices

DisplayString.Name: Operating system (mobile)
DisplayString.Description: Defines the basic properties of mobile operating systems

DisplayString.Name: Name
DisplayString.Description: Name of the mobile operating system

DisplayString.Name: Version
DisplayString.Description: Version of the mobile operating system

DisplayString.Name: Language
DisplayString.Description: Language of the mobile operating system

DisplayString.Name: Publisher
DisplayString.Description: Publisher of the mobile operating system

DisplayString.Name: Has mobile operating system
DisplayString.Description: Relationship between mobile devices and their operating systems

DisplayString.Name: Network Device
DisplayString.Description: Defines the basic properties of network devices, such as routers

DisplayString.Name: Group
DisplayString.Description: Defines the basic properties of configuration item groups, such as computer or user groups

DisplayString.Name: Perspective
DisplayString.Description: Defines the basic properties of perspectives, such as those created for synthetic transactions. The perspective sets the point of view from which the transaction performance is measured, such as a specific Web service

DisplayString.Name: Operating System
DisplayString.Description: Defines the basic properties of operating systems, such as Windows operating systems

DisplayString.Name: Computer Role
DisplayString.Description: Defines the basic properties of computer roles, such as File Server

DisplayString.Name: Local Application
DisplayString.Description: Defines the basic properties of applications that are directly hosted by a computer

DisplayString.Name: Service
DisplayString.Description: Defines the basic properties of services

DisplayString.Name: Application Component
DisplayString.Description: Defines the basic properties of components that are part of an application

DisplayString.Name: Software Installation
DisplayString.Description: Defines the basic properties of software installations

DisplayString.Name: Reference
DisplayString.Description: Defines the basic properties of directed relationships

DisplayString.Name: Membership
DisplayString.Description: Defines the basic properties of relationships that represent containment

DisplayString.Name: Hosting
DisplayString.Description: All Containment Relationships where the child requires the parent to exist.

DisplayString.Name: Entity Watched By Perspective
DisplayString.Description: All Relationships designating an Entity being monitored by a Perspective.

DisplayString.Name: Web Site
DisplayString.Description: Defines the basic properties of Web sites

DisplayString.Name: FTP Site
DisplayString.Description: Defines the basic properties of FTP sites

DisplayString.Description: This is the date and time the data item was created.

DisplayString.Name: Ping request completed with status code: $Data/ResponseStatus$.
DisplayString.Description: This string is the short description for an ICMPResponse dataitem.

DisplayString.Description: The host name or IP address of the ping destination.

DisplayString.Description: The response code for the ICMP request.

DisplayString.Name: Ping Response Message
DisplayString.Description: Textual description of the response status code.

DisplayString.Name: Ping Response Time (ms)
DisplayString.Description: The round trip time (RTT) of the ICMP request and response in milliseconds.

DisplayString.Name: Number of Retry Attempts
DisplayString.Description: Number of retries for the ICMP request.

DisplayString.Name: Configuration Item
DisplayString.Description: Defines the basic properties of configuration items

DisplayString.Name: User
DisplayString.Description: Defines the basic properties of users. Use this to query or target users across all other categories, such as Active Directory users.

DisplayString.Name: Domain User or Group
DisplayString.Description: Defines the basic properties of domain users or groups

DisplayString.Name: Printer
DisplayString.Description: Defines the basic properties of printers

DisplayString.Name: Collection
DisplayString.Description: Defines the basic properties of collections

DisplayString.Name: Primary User
DisplayString.Description: Relationship between a computer and its primary user

DisplayString.Name: Owned By User
DisplayString.Description: Relationship between a configuration item, such as a computer, and the user that owns it

DisplayString.Name: Uses device
DisplayString.Description: Relationship between a user and the devices used by that user

DisplayString.Name: Affects Customers
DisplayString.Description: Relationship between a configuration item and the customers that it affects

DisplayString.Name: Serviced By User
DisplayString.Description: Relationship between a configuration item and the user that services it

DisplayString.Name: Manages User
DisplayString.Description: Relationship between users and their managers

DisplayString.Name: Affects User
DisplayString.Description: Relationship between a service and the users that it affects

DisplayString.Name: Contains Configuration Item
DisplayString.Description: Relationship between a configuration item and configuration items that it contains

DisplayString.Name: Is Related to Configuration Item
DisplayString.Description: Relationship between a configuration item and related configuration items

DisplayString.Name: Event Description: $Data/EventDescription$
DisplayString.Description: This string is the short description for an Event data item.

The following has occurred $Data/Count$ times:
$Context/Context/DataItem$
DisplayString.Description: This string is the short description for a Consolidator data item.

Item 2: $Context/Item1Context/DataItem$

DisplayString.Name: Geo Location
DisplayString.Description: Geo location object specifying the latitude and longitude of an object.

DisplayString.Name: Id
DisplayString.Description: Identity of the geo location object.

DisplayString.Name: Latitude
DisplayString.Description: An imaginary line joining points on the surface of the Earth that are all of equal distance north or south of the equator.

DisplayString.Name: Longitude
DisplayString.Description: The angular distance east or west of the prime meridian that stretches from the North Pole to the South Pole and passes through Greenwich, England.

DisplayString.Name: Config Item References Location
DisplayString.Description: Config item references a location object.
